topic.title: Btsync ,a soft use P2P to share files.
topic.body:
The official websiteï¼šhttps://www.getsync.com/
The site of keys shared by users : http://btsynckeys.com

1_12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx.body:
> [weakish](#comment_7_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR): There is an open source alternative syncthing. However, if you want to sync with iOS devices or publicly with lots of people, BTSync is the only choice.

Yes,I use this soft just because it surpports almost all systems and it can share keys to everybody who use it.Syncthing is open source,but it is not good for using.
